column4: i just bought an msi k9ngm4 v2 mobo and it has a regular telephone jack on it and im trying to set up a dail up connection but vista says there is no network adapter, i know this is ubuntu but this is the only place i know of to ask for help
In all seriousness, we don't do Windows support so you will have to try somewhere else. I will PM you a good website that has great support forums even though it is an overclocking website.
